summary: Champion\'s Cudgel from Dragonborn DLC is now temperable
descriptionHtml:
*******NOW FIXED BY UNOFFICIAL DRAGONBORN PATCH 1.0.4********

\"Wow, first time playing the Dragonborn DLC and I got this cool unique hammer! I\'m going to give this to my follower. *goes to sharpening wheel* Wait, WTF? \"

As the title says- a quick fix to make the unique weapon, Champion\'s Cudgel, to be temperable.

* uses 1 steel ignot
* benefits from steel smithing perk

This is meant to be a quick fix until USKP fixes it themselves.

REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC
author: softcatsocks
